description.english: Control Volmja through Happiness
description.schinese: 通过快乐度来掌控沃尔姆贾
description.russian: Контролировать Вольмию при помощи счастья
description.italian: Controlla Volmja tramite la Felicità
description.spanish: Controla Volmja mediante Felicidad
description.brazilian: Controle Volmja através da Felicidade
description.japanese: 幸福度でヴォルミアを制す

description.english: Control Volmja through Authority
description.schinese: 通过权威来掌控沃尔姆贾
description.russian: Контролировать Вольмию при помощи силы власти
description.italian: Controlla Volmja tramite l'Autorità
description.spanish: Controla Volmja mediante Autoridad
description.brazilian: Controle Volmja através da Autoridade
description.japanese: 権威でヴォルミアを制す

description.english: Ruins relations with the Folks
description.schinese: 与民众关系恶化
description.russian: Погубить отношения с простым людом
description.italian: Rovina le relazioni col Popolo
description.spanish: Rompe tus relaciones con el pueblo
description.brazilian: Arruine as relações com o Povo
description.japanese: 民衆との関係を壊す

description.english: Ruin relations with the Church
description.schinese: 与教会关系恶化
description.russian: Погубить отношения с церковью
description.italian: Rovina le relazioni con la Chiesa
description.spanish: Rompe tus relaciones con la Iglesia
description.brazilian: Arruine as relações com a Igreja
description.japanese: 教会との関係を壊す

description.english: Ruin relations with the Krovans
description.schinese: 与柯凡人关系恶化
description.russian: Погубить отношения с Крованом
description.italian: Rovina le relazioni con i Krovan
description.spanish: Rompe tus relaciones con los krovanos
description.brazilian: Arruine as relações com os Krovanianos
description.japanese: クロヴァンとの関係を壊す

description.english: Have the Archbishop and Baron killed
description.schinese: 杀死大主教和男爵
description.russian: Убить архиепископа и барона
description.italian: Giustizia l'Arcivescovo e il Barone
description.spanish: Manda asesinar al Arzobispo y a su mascota, el Barón
description.brazilian: Faça com que o Arcebispo e o Barão sejam mortos
description.japanese: 大司教と男爵を殺害する

description.english: Let the Krovans win
description.schinese: 让柯凡人胜利
description.russian: Позволить крованцам победить
description.italian: Lascia vincere i Krovan
description.spanish: Deja ganar a los krovanos
description.brazilian: Deixe os Krovanianos vencerem
description.japanese: クロヴァンを勝たせる

description.english: Win the final battle
description.schinese: 赢得最终战斗的胜利
description.russian: Победить в решающей битве
description.italian: Vinci la battaglia finale
description.spanish: Gana la batalla final
description.brazilian: Vença a batalha final
description.japanese: 最終決戦に勝利する

description.english: Conquer the whole map in Sandbox mode
description.schinese: 在沙盒模式中征服整个地图
description.russian: Захватить всю карту в режиме песочницы
description.italian: Conquista tutta la mappa in Sandbox
description.spanish: Conquista todo el mapa en el Modo Sandbox
description.brazilian: Conquiste o mapa inteiro no modo Sandbox
description.japanese: サンドボックスモードで全マップを制覇する

description.english: First kill
description.schinese: 第一次击杀
description.russian: Первое убийство
description.italian: Prima uccisione
description.spanish: Mata a tu primer enemigo
description.brazilian: Primeira eliminação
description.japanese: ファーストキル

description.english: First 100 kills
description.schinese: 100次击杀

description.italian: Prime 100 uccisioni
description.spanish: Mata a 100 enemigos
description.brazilian: Primeiras 100 eliminações

description.english: Finish a campaign without losing a single battle (Autoresolves don't count)
description.schinese: 在不输掉任何一场战斗的情况下完成战役（自动战斗不算）
description.russian: Пройти кампанию без единого поражения в бою (автозавершённые не учитываются)
description.italian: Concludi la campagna senza subire neanche una sconfitta (la risoluzione automatica non conta)
description.spanish: Completa una campaña sin perder una sola batalla (Autorresolver no cuenta)
description.brazilian: Conclua a campanha sem perder uma única batalha (Resumir batalhas não conta)
description.japanese: 1回も負けずにキャンペーンをクリアする（自動戦闘はカウントされない）

description.english: Build one of each of the buildings available in the game
description.schinese: 在游戏中建造所有类型的建筑
description.russian: Построить каждое сооружение, доступное в игре
description.italian: Costruisci almeno un edificio per tipo
description.spanish: Construye al menos un edificio de cada tipo (sin contar torres)
description.brazilian: Construa cada uma das estruturas disponíveis no jogo
description.japanese: ゲーム内の施設を1つずつ建てる

description.english: Build one of each of the towers available in the game
description.schinese: 在游戏中建造所有类型的塔楼
description.russian: Построить каждую башню, доступную в игре
description.italian: Costruisci almeno una torre per tipo
description.spanish: Construye al menos una torre de cada tipo
description.brazilian: Construa cada uma das torres disponíveis no jogo
description.japanese: ゲーム内のタワーを1つずつ建てる

description.english: Kill 1000 enemies with artilleries
description.schinese: 使用火炮击杀1000名敌人
description.russian: Убить 1000 врагов при помощи артиллерии
description.italian: Uccidi 1000 nemici con le artiglierie
description.spanish: Mata a 1000 enemigos con artillería
description.brazilian: Elimine 1.000 inimigos com artilharias
description.japanese: 砲台で敵を1000人倒す

description.english: Finish the campaign in easy mode
description.schinese: 在简单难度下完成战役

description.brazilian: Conclua a campanha no modo fácil

description.brazilian: Conclua a campanha no modo intermediário

description.english: Upgrade a settlement to Town
description.schinese: 将一处据点升级为城镇
description.russian: Улучшить поселение до города
description.italian: Migliora un insediamento fino a farne una Città
description.spanish: Mejora un asentamiento a Villa
description.brazilian: Aprimore um assentamento para Cidade

description.spanish: Mejora un asentamiento a Fortaleza
description.brazilian: Aprimore um assentamento para Fortaleza
description.japanese: 拠点を要塞にアップグレードする

description.english: Develop 3 Resources&Building Tier 5 technologies
description.schinese: 完成3个等级5的资源&建筑研究
description.russian: Разработать 3 технологии 5 уровня в категории Ресурсы и строения
description.italian: Sviluppa 3 tecnologie di Livello 5 nella categoria Risorse & Edifici
description.spanish: Desarrolla 3 tecnologías de nivel 5 en la rama de Recursos y Edificios
description.brazilian: Desenvolva 3 tecnologias de Categoria 5 de Recursos e Estruturas
description.japanese: 資源と建物レベル5の技術を3つ開発する

description.english: Develop 3 Towers Tier 5 technologies
description.schinese: 完成3个等级5的塔楼研究
description.russian: Разработать 3 технологии 5 уровня в категории Башни

description.spanish: Desarrolla 3 tecnologías de nivel 5 en la rama de Torres
description.brazilian: Desenvolva 3 tecnologias de Categoria 5 de Torres
description.japanese: タワーレベル5の技術を3つ開発する

description.english: Develop 3 Soldiers&Builders Tier 5 technologies
description.schinese: 完成3个等级5的士兵&建筑工研究
description.russian: Разработать 3 технологии 5 уровня в категории Солдаты и рабочие

description.brazilian: Desenvolva 3 tecnologias de Categoria 5 de Soldados e Construtores
description.japanese: 兵士と大工レベル5の技術を3つ開発する

description.english: One tower achieves 100 kills in a single battle
description.schinese: 在同一场战斗中单个塔楼达成100击杀。
description.russian: Одна башня набирает 100 убийств в одной битве
description.italian: Una torre elimina 100 nemici in una sola battaglia
description.spanish: Consigue que una torre mate a 100 enemigos en una sola batalla
description.brazilian: Uma torre elimina 100 inimigos numa única batalha
description.japanese: 1つのタワーが1回の戦闘で100キルを達成する

displayName.spanish: Aprendiendo a ser yunque (para llegar a ser martillo)

description.english: Win one battle in intermediate mode building only 2 towers.
description.schinese: 在中等难度下一场战斗中仅建造2坐塔楼并赢得战斗。
description.russian: Победить в битве на среднем уровне сложности, построив всего 2 башни
description.italian: Vinci una battaglia a difficoltà Intermedia con non più di due torri
description.spanish: Gana una batalla en el Modo Intermedio construyendo sólo 2 torres
description.brazilian: Vença uma batalha no modo intermediário construindo apenas 2 torres.
description.japanese: ミディアムモードでタワー2つだけで戦闘に勝利する

description.english: Don't skip a single dialog during a campaign run
description.schinese: 在整个战役中不跳过任何剧情对话。
description.russian: Не пропустить ни одного диалога во время кампании
description.italian: Non saltare neanche un dialogo nella campagna
description.spanish: No te saltes ni un solo diálogo durante una campaña
description.brazilian: Não pule nenhum diálogo durante a campanha
description.japanese: キャンペーン中に一度も会話をスキップしない

description.english: Build and unleash your first Bombardier

description.spanish: Construye y despliega tu primer Bombardero
description.brazilian: Construa e utilize seu primeiro Bombardeiro
description.japanese: 爆撃タワーを作って解き放つ

description.english: Beat all the 26 base arcade maps in Easy mode
description.schinese: 在简单模式下通关所有街机模式地图
description.russian: Пройти все 26 основных аркадных карт на лёгком уровне сложности

description.brazilian: Vença todos os 26 mapas básicos do modo Arcade no fácil
description.japanese: イージーモードで26の基本アーケードマップを全て制覇する

description.english: Beat all the 26 base arcade maps in Intermediate mode
description.schinese: 在中等模式下通关所有街机模式地图
description.russian: Пройти все 26 основных аркадных карт на среднем уровне сложности

description.spanish: Vence en los 26 niveles base del Modo Arcade en Dificultad Intermedia
description.brazilian: Vença todos os 26 mapas básicos do modo Arcade no intermediário
description.japanese: ミディアムモードで26の基本アーケードマップを全て制覇する

description.english: Beat all the 26 base arcade maps in Hardcore mode
description.schinese: 在硬核模式下通关所有街机模式地图

description.english: Set aflame an enemy covered in oil
description.schinese: 将一名浸满油渍的敌人点燃
description.russian: Поджечь врага, облитого маслом
description.italian: Appicca il fuoco a un nemico coperto d'olio
description.spanish: Prende fuego a un enemigo cubierto de alquitrán
description.brazilian: Incendeie um inimigo coberto de óleo
description.japanese: 油まみれの敵を燃やす

description.english: Have a Soldier die while under the effects of Martyrdom and running out of enemies
description.schinese: 使一名正逃离敌人的士兵在殉道效果中死亡
description.russian: Сделать так, чтобы солдат с действующим эффектом Мученичество умер от нехватки врагов
description.italian: Un soldato muore durante l'effetto di Martirio
description.spanish: Consigue que un Soldado muera bajo los efectos de Martirio al acabarse los enemigos
description.brazilian: Faça um Soldado morrer sob o efeito de Martírio ficando sem inimigos
description.japanese: 殉職の効果を受けて敵がいなくなったときに兵士が死ぬ

description.english: Kill 10 enemies with a single Call the Charge! ability use
description.schinese: 在一次发起冲锋！技能效果中击杀10名敌人
description.russian: Убить 10 врагов одним применением способности В атаку!
description.italian: Uccidi almeno 10 nemici con una sola carica di cavalleria
description.spanish: Mata a 10 enemigos con un único uso de la habilidad ¡Llamad a la caballería!
description.brazilian: Elimine 10 inimigos com uma única utilização da habilidade Chamem a Cavalaria!
description.japanese: 一回の「突撃せよ！」能力使用時に敵を10人倒す

description.english: Fight and finish 100 battles
description.schinese: 完成100场战斗
description.russian: Завершить 100 битв
description.italian: Combatti almeno 100 battaglie
description.spanish: Combate en 100 batallas hasta el final
description.brazilian: Lute até o fim em 100 batalhas
description.japanese: 戦闘を100回完了する

description.english: Successfully prevent one event in a province
description.schinese: 成功阻止郡县中一次事件的发生
description.russian: Успешно предотвратить одно событие в провинции
description.italian: Previeni con successo un evento in una provincia
description.spanish: Evita con éxito un evento en una provincia
description.brazilian: Obtenha sucesso na prevenção de um evento de uma província
description.japanese: 郡のイベントを防ぐことに成功する

description.english: Complete the main tutorial
description.schinese: 完成主教程
description.russian: Завершить основное обучение
description.italian: Concludi il tutorial principale
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial
description.brazilian: Conclua o tutorial principal
description.japanese: メインチュートリアルを完了する

description.english: Collect 5 Gold Medals in Arcade (3 stars battles in Hardcore mode)
description.schinese: 在街机模式下收集5个金牌（硬核模式下战斗3星）
description.russian: Собрать 5 золотых медалей в аркадном режиме (за битвы с 3 звёздами на трудном уровне сложности)
description.italian: Colleziona 5 medaglie d'oro in Arcade (3 stelle in battaglia)
description.spanish: Consigue 5 medallas de oro en el modo Arcade (batallas de 3 estrellas en modo Hardcore)
description.brazilian: Colete 5 Medalhas de Ouro no modo Arcade (3 estrelas em batalhas no modo Hardcore)
description.japanese: アーケードでゴールドメダルを5枚集める（ハードコアモードの3つ星バトル）

description.english: Hang 3 governors
description.schinese: 吊死3名执政官
description.russian: Повесить 3 губернаторов
description.italian: Impicca 3 governatori
description.spanish: Ahorca a 3 gobernadores
description.brazilian: Enforque 3 governantes
description.japanese: 郡主を3人処刑する
